snippet: Tyson Barrie scored a tiebreaking power-play goal with 7:10 left in the third period, and the Colorado Avalanche beat the Chicago Blackhawks 4-2 on Tuesday night for their third straight win....

headline.print_headline: Avalanche Gets Big 4-2 Win Over Blackhawks
headline.main: Avalanche Gets Big 4-2 Win Over Blackhawks

lead_paragraph: Tyson Barrie scored a tiebreaking power-play goal with 7:10 left in the third period, and the Colorado Avalanche beat the Chicago Blackhawks 4-2 on Tuesday night for their third straight win.
